attributes.action: A Vote of No Confidence in Boris Johnson for the mishandling of Covid19 & Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Because of the constant lies and historic spread by PM Boris Johnson  During Brexit and mishandling of Covid 19 pandemic.
attributes.background: Call for PM Boris Johnson to step down from his position and a new General Election.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for votes of no confidence in the Government or particular ministers.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.

We also couldn't publish a petition that alleged that a minister had lied.
